Introduction

Eun Sol is a South Korean BJ, singer and dancer. She was a member and leader of the girl group TROPICAL and a former member of Bambino.

In June 2015, she debuted as a member of the girl group Bambino with the group's first release "Oppa Oppa". She left the group sometime in 2017, for unspecified reasons.

She re-debuted in August 2018, in LUK Factory's second girl group TROPICAL with the group's debut digital single "Mwah".

On October 30, 2018, she posted a photo of her bandaged leg, explaining to that she got into a car accident, she elaborated by saying that she hit a guard rail and she lost control over the car, that started to spin rapidly. Eun Sol ended the post by confirming that she's following physiotherapy and that she's thankful she only sustained minor injury's.
